sn7.10:5.2: I don’t think BB’s “blankets” is correct here. Why would you keep on using a flea-bitten blanket? In India, where you only need them for a short period? As per AN 6.16, I think this refers to the household carpets, which, laid on a floor of mud, are essential, expensive, and time-consuming, so that their upkeep is a significant part of the family duties.
